comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

Проблема заключается в том, что приложение Poweramp не загружает обложки под любым вайфаем. Проблема заключается в том, что приложение Poweramp не загружает обложки под любым вайфаем. Под LTE или любым другим мобильным протоколом связи обложки загружаются. > Если в меню Настройки приложений-Poweramp-Настройки-Защита AdGuard выключить полностью защиту, то проблема загрузки обложек под вайфаем исчезает. > Если последовательно отключать все другие опции в Настройки приложений-Poweramp-Настройки, кроме Защита AdGuard, проблема с загрузкой не решается. > Под мобильными протоколами всё работает. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jA9QpdE.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WdUy69t.jpg)

issue.title: dynatrace-managed.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://dynatrace-managed.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdynatrace-managed.com) ### Comment > Your blocklist includes dynatrace-managed.com which isn't really a tracking server. > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bdf972731f25438463ea58fd36f2b2d12c8ff555/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers.txt#L141 > > It is a web console for paying customers to access their internal application. > > > These URLs are typically not public and much of the data is unrelated to anything from the end user and it is used to monitor their infrastructure. > > > Since the goal is to disable the browser error monitoring for dynatrace simply block the URL /ruxitagentjs or rb_ > > This would still provide the behavior you are looking for. > > https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/rum-firewall#requests > > ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: Отслеживающие параметры URL
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

v3.6.7 (41)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.rbc.ru/technology_and_media/04/06/2022/629b19f99a794774f9190c88?from=from_main_9

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track header

### Add your comment and screenshots

На следующих сайтах
[1](https://www.rbc.ru/technology_and_media/04/06/2022/629b19f99a794774f9190c88?from=from_main_9)
[2](https://www.kommersant.ru/doc/5391741?from=anons)
используются следующие url параметры:
- ?tag=
- ?from=

для seo оптимизации,которые также являются отслеживающими параметрами,которые могут быть использованы для отслеживания активности на данных сайтах из вне!

Цель рапорта: прошу добавить в соответствующую подписку!

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![snapshot_www kommersant ru_1654388970119](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34476664/172030644-93cdacdd-dd2c-4055-9dbd-38fca4a67db2.png)







</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:

issue.title: Booking.com reservation emails
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Booking.com reservation emails

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

"Modify your booking" gives a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?aid=000000;bn=0000000000;pincode=0000&;source=conf_email;pbsource=conf_email_modify;pbtrack=email_mainCTA like URL.

"As evident", booking.com uses a lot of `;` as parameter-separators (which I guess that we can do nothing about?)
e.g. "Get the print version" ends up in a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?auth_success=1;pbtrack=email_print_btn;pincode=0000;=;bn=0000000000;aid=000000;label=conf_email_print;pbsource=conf_email_modify;source=conf_email URL, which is "maybe non-parseable" by standard semantics

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Booking.com reservation emails
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Booking.com reservation emails

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

"Modify your booking" gives a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?aid=000000;bn=0000000000;pincode=0000&;source=conf_email;pbsource=conf_email_modify;pbtrack=email_mainCTA like URL.

"As evident", booking.com uses a lot of `;` as parameter-separators (which I guess that we can do nothing about?)
e.g. "Get the print version" ends up in a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?auth_success=1;pbtrack=email_print_btn;pincode=0000;=;bn=0000000000;aid=000000;label=conf_email_print;pbsource=conf_email_modify;source=conf_email URL, which is "maybe non-parseable" by standard semantics

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Removing `;source` (as key altogether) still merits handling

issue.title: Unchecking "Enabled on this site" does not disable the annoyances filters for the site
issue.body:
@piejanssens commented on [Tue Jun 07 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718)

<!--  As an open-source project with a dedicated but small maintainer team, it can sometimes take a long time for issues to be addressed so please be patient and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
-->

### Prerequisites

Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue. **YOU MAY DELETE THE PREREQUISITES SECTION.**

- [X] I am running the latest version
- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### Issue Details

<!--- Please include all relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->

* AdGuard for Safari version: 1.11.4
* Environment name and version: Safari 15.5 (17613.2.7.1.8)
* Operating System: macOS 12.4.0
* Filters you use in AdGuard: ads, privacy, annoyances (EasyList Cookie List, I don't care about cookies, AdBlock warning removal list), language-specific (NL)


### Expected Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
If I uncheck "Enabled on this site", I expect any AdGuard to no longer affect the site in any way.

### Actual Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what actually happened. -->
Some filters are still being applied. I am certain that this is a bug in AdGuard as I can get the wanted effect by disabling the AdGuard all-together via the "Pause AdGuard for Safari" option.

### Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

<!--- drag and drop, upload or paste your screenshot to this area-->

</details>

### Additional Information
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->

---

@Birbber commented on [Wed Jun 08 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718#issuecomment-1150112013)

@piejanssens Hi! Could you give an example of the webpage so I could check it on my end?

---

@piejanssens commented on [Wed Jun 08 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718#issuecomment-1150120107)

Hi @Birbber,

1. Enable the "I don't care about cookies" annoyance filter.
2. Visit https://www.era.be/nl/te-koop
3. Notice you can't scroll
4. Disable AdGuard on the site
5. Notice you still can't scroll...
7. "Pause AdGuard for Safari"
8. Accept the cookies
9. Notice you can scroll

issue.title: miraculous.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://miraculous.to/en/watch?s=5&e=01](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmiraculous.to%2Fen%2Fwatch%3Fs%3D5%26e%3D01) ### Comment > Реклама на самом сайте появляется в зависимости от версии фильтров. Иногда она вообще не блокируется, иногда частично — самой рекламы нет, но при клике на сайт перекидывает на рекламную страницу, так как реклама жёстко встроена в сайт, судя по всему. Сейчас же реклама блокируется, но бьёт тревогу антивирус — блокирует рекламные сайты. Значит, что реклама не до конца блокируется на этом сайте. Раньше такого не было. ### Screenshots

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)
